Title: XAMLStylePad
Description: XAMLStylePad - is a simple in use styles and templates XAML-editor. It designed for comfortable coding in XAML with real-time preview result on automatically created sample controls and quick navigation in styles tree.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
XAMLStylePad - is a simple in use styles and templates XAML-editor. It designed for comfortable coding in XAML with real-time preview result on automatically created sample controls and quick navigation in styles tree.
